biotools.summary: FunHoP (Functional Homologous Proteins) is a Python method which improves pathway analysis done on KEGG networks in Cytoscape. It is a tool for enhanced visualization and analysis of functionally homologous proteins in Complex Metabolic Networks.

bioschemas.name: FunHoP
